annotations.description: Feeing so happy to get back to this series of cocktails! For those of you who don't know we have been slowly making our way through Kara Newman's great book ...
annotations.title: Nightcap: Sable

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Reposado Tequila
.25oz (7.5ml) Coffee Liqueur
.25oz (7.5ml) Grade B Maple Syrup
4 drops Mole Bitters
Orange Twist

Stir in glass over ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qZvjDIm5cKA&t=0s
title: Sable
